changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `erp_ac_account_subject_tpl` ( `id` BIGINT ( 20 ) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键ID', `category` varchar(64) not null comment '会计分类', `code` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL COMMENT '科目编码', `name` VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '科目名称', `fast_code` VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '助记码', `direction` INT NOT NULL COMMENT '余额方向', `pid` BIGINT NULL COMMENT '上级ID', `status` INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '是否正常状态0被删除1正常', `created_date` TIMESTAMP(0) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `created_by` VARCHAR(60) NOT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `last_modified_date` TIMESTAMP(0) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后更新时间', `last_modified_by` VARCHAR(60) NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '最后更新人', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) USING BTREE ) ENGINE = INNODB AUTO_INCREMENT = 1 CHARACTER SET = utf8mb4 COLLATE = utf8mb4_unicode_ci COMMENT '财务-科目模板';
create unique index uidx_subject_tpl_code on erp_ac_account_subject_tpl(code);
